question:
During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.

Write a letter to this businessman.

In your letter,

 
remind him when and where you met
tell him what kind of job you are interested in
say why you think you would be suitable for the job
Write at least 150 words.

You do NOT need to write any addresses.

Begin your letter as follows:

Dear ..................,
text: This is James Austin and I am writing this letter to remind you regarding our recent acquaintances on 24th June during our flight to Brampton and we met at a cafe at the airport and you suggested to me that I should contact you about a job in  one of your restaurant.I also got your biding card.

Let me explain the situation to you as I have worked earlier as an assistant manager in my own hometown,It would be my humble pleasure if I am given this job as I can perform this duty comfortably and conveniently.

Additionally , I have completed my graduation in  hospitality so I can manage a restaurant and hotel simultaneously.Indeed , I am quite hardworking and committed to my professional work so if you employ me I try my best to prove myself as a valuable employee of our company.
Awaiting a favourable response from your side soon.
